channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging foliage impeding walkway, 26th September
item.description:
Foliage and branches overhang on both sides of the fenced on the walks path between Leopold road and kings street (where the pub), making it narrow and restricting passage

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Walks, Finchley, London

item.title: Two street lights out on brown street, 26th September
item.description:
Patrolling around Portsea place. All street lights seem to be working. Tarek

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Nutford Place, Marylebone, London

item.title: Abandoned for 3 months at least, no MOT, flat front near side tyre, 26th September
item.description:
Abandoned on the right hand side of Woodside Road at the junction of Southborough Road. Abandoned at least 3 months, flat front near side tyre, no MOT according to .gov.uk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodside Road, Southborough, London

item.title: Rotten Bollard Broken, 26th September
item.description:
An old bollard has been broken late this afternoon and adjacent one (in foreground of pic) is also weak. Children playing on bikes were noticed near to the bollards and dispersed quickly after a cracking sound was heard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broomhill Road, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive Littering, 26th September
item.description:
The black commercial bin in Fletching Rd hasnâ€™t been emptied in weeks. There is now excessive littering around it attracting vermin. See pic. I collected litter from Fletching Rd this evening, (see pic) but was unable to do so around the black bin, as there is just too much. This is my second posting of this problem. Please can you get it sorted asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light not working, 26th September

item.title: Path closure barriers no longer in place, 26th September
item.description:
The steps down to the river near pageant crescent are in need of repair. Therefore access has been blocked for months. Now the barriers are no longer in place properly. The steps should be repaired or access permanently blocked - not with too large plastic fences.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pigeon feces, 26th September
item.description:
In the past year there has been an increase in the pigeon colony in Clarence rd and therefore the streets have become filled with their feces. In this particular point of the street it has escalated very quickly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Combustible materials (sofas) flytipped, 26th September
item.description:
Combustible materials (sofas) flytipped on street. This street has been subject to at least 2 deliberate fires in the last month so we would urge for the flytipping to be removed. Noticed by London Fire Brigade while attending a fire on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Timber Mill Way, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard has been removed/ stolen., 26th September
item.description:
The central bollard that prevents Wythfield Road being used as a through road to circumvent traffic lights at the intersection on the High Street has been removed/ stolen. Significant amount of traffic now flowing through Wythfield Road, which is made worse by double parking at the other entrance - causing bottle necks and risk to pedestrain and road safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wythfield Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
